title: John Heitinga appointed head coach of Ajax
snippet: Heitinga is signing a contract with Ajax as head coach until June 30, 2027. Marcel Keizer will be his assistant and is signing a contract of the same duration. Date: 31.05.2025 · Photographer: AFC Ajax ·

title: AFC Ajax - Wikipedia
snippet: On 19 May 2023, Sven Mislintat took over as Ajax's sports director. He succeeded Marc Overmars, who left in early 2022. Mislintat appointed Maurice Steijn as head coach. Mislintat spent approximately 111 million euros on transfers. Ajax had its worst start to the season in fifty-nine years.

title: r/soccer on Reddit: [VI] Fred Grim will be Ajax first team head coach until at least the winter break
snippet: [Romano] Ajax have agreed deal to appoint John Heitinga as new head coach on two year contract.

title: Ajax hires Liverpool assistant John Heitinga as new head coach | AP News
snippet: AMSTERDAM (AP) — Ajax hired John Heitinga as head coach on Saturday to replace Francesco Farioli nearly two weeks after the Italian resigned following the team’s late-season collapse.

title: Official website AFC Ajax Amsterdam - Ajax.nl
snippet: Ajax are fully focused on Sunday's Klassieker against Feyenoord. Head coach Fred Grim looked ahead to the clash with the Rotterdam side on Friday at the Johan Cruijff Arena, addressing the fitness of his squad and the team’s preparations for the match.
